title: VA - Metal Hammer MAXIMUM METAL DVD Vol. 132 2008
description:
MAXIMUM METAL DVD Vol. 132

This is a Video-DVD that came along with the German Metal Hammer Magazine. It contains clips and interviews. The interviews are mostly in English with selectable subtitles in German. Below there is a list with the clips.

The DVD is higly recommended!

And now in German;
